## assertNotSelector() function

Asserts that a selector is not present in the passed page or frame.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertNotSelector(page: PentfPage, selector: string, { timeout, message }?: TimeoutOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  page | [PentfPage](./pentf.pentfpage.md) | puppeteer page object. |
|  selector | string | \[CSS selector\](https://www.w3.org/TR/2018/REC-selectors-3-20181106/\#selectors) (aka query selector) of the targeted element. |
|  { timeout, message } | [TimeoutOptions](./pentf.timeoutoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Example


```javascript
await assertNotSelector(page, 'div[data-id="foo"] a.view', {message: 'Expected foo to not be present'});

```
